alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 3:16PM CDT until June 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Custer. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen with additional heavy rain expected. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Comstock, Weissert, Round Valley, Wescott and Big Oak Canyon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
